Method Detail

open

public void open()
          throws CsvBangException

Open file in order to write. Initialize file. Create CSV file and write header.

Not necessary to open writer. To the first, write the writer if it's not opened, will be opened.

Specified by:
open in interface CsvWriter<T>
Throws:
CsvBangException - if a problem occurred during creation of file
Since:
0.0.1
